description: Try our easy to follow Floating Ghost Cup Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Floating Ghost Cup Cakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Chupa Chups Sour Bites Share Pack

recipeInstructions.text: Sieve the flour, cocoa powder and baking powder together into a large mixing bowl. Add the caster sugar and 1 tsp of salt then set aside
Add 1/2 cup of milk, 1 tsp vinegar, 1/2 cup of canola oil and 2 eggs to another mixing bowl and whisk
Combine the 2 bowls and whisk together
Add 1/4 cup of boiling water and whisk
Evenly distribute the mix in to 12 cup cake cases
Frost the cake with your favourite frosting then carefully place the Sour Bites pieces to cover the cake top
Unwrap a Chupa Chups lollipop and place in the centre of the cake
Roll out the white rolling icing (fondant) and use a circle cutter to cut in to approx. 8cm
Wrap the icing over the top of the lollipop and position in to your best ghost shape
Use a sharp object such as a cocktail stick to mark the eyes
